main.name: Shravani Roy
main.description: Senior Software Engineer building scalable cloud-native platforms with Go, Rails, React, and Kubernetes.
main.bio: I focus on high-impact platform engineering across distributed systems, API infrastructure, and developer tooling. Key outcomes include building an LLM-powered log analysis platform, implementing RBAC-based authorization for multi-tenant services, and improving API reliability through distributed caching and CI/CD automation.
